argument.name: table_or_set_to_drop
argument.description: The full filename and path of the Alpha table being removed.

page.description: Remove the selected table or set from the database. Can take a CRLF delimited list.
page.discussion: FILE_DROP_FROM_DB() drops the table (.dbf) or set (.set) from the database (the .adb file) so that the Table_Filename no longer appears in the Control Panel. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script drops a table from the Control Panel.
